registry.comment:
Copyright (c) 2017-2024, The Khronos Group Inc.
SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 OR MIT
------------------------------------------------------------------------
This file, xr.xml, is the OpenXR API Registry. It is a critically important and normative part of the OpenXR Specification, including a canonical machine-readable definition of the API, parameter and member validation language incorporated into the Specification and reference pages, and other material which is registered by Khronos, such as tags used by extension and layer authors. The only authoritative version of xr.xml is the one maintained in the default branch of the Khronos OpenXR GitHub project.

vendorid.name: KHR
vendorid.comment: This is the next available Khronos vendor ID

tag.name: MSFT
tag.author: Microsoft
tag.contact: Alex Turner @alexturn, Yin Li @yl_msft, Bryce Hutchings @brycehutchings, Lachlan Ford @laford_msft, Minmin Gong @gongminmin

types.type: // OpenXR current version number. #define XR_CURRENT_API_VERSION XR_MAKE_VERSION(1, 1, 36)
#if !defined(XR_DEFINE_HANDLE) #if (XR_PTR_SIZE == 8) #define XR_DEFINE_HANDLE(object) typedef struct object##_T* object; #else #define XR_DEFINE_HANDLE(object) typedef uint64_t object; #endif #endif

#if !defined(XR_DEFINE_OPAQUE_64) #if (XR_PTR_SIZE == 8) #define XR_DEFINE_OPAQUE_64(object) typedef struct object##_T* object; #else #define XR_DEFINE_OPAQUE_64(object) typedef uint64_t object; #endif #endif
types.comment: XrBaseInStructure and XrBaseOutStructure use "struct" in their member definitions because they are recursive structures and this is easier than modifying the tooling to output forward declarations.
types.type: typedef XrResult (XRAPI_PTR *PFN_xrGetInstanceProcAddr)(XrInstance instance, const char* name, PFN_xrVoidFunction* function);

enums.name: API Constants
enums.comment: Misc. hardcoded constants - not an enumerated type

enum.name: XR_SUCCESS
enum.comment: Function successfully completed.

enum.name: XR_TIMEOUT_EXPIRED
enum.comment: The specified timeout time occurred before the operation could complete.

enum.name: XR_SESSION_LOSS_PENDING
enum.comment: The session will be lost soon.

enum.name: XR_EVENT_UNAVAILABLE
enum.comment: No event was available.

enum.name: XR_SPACE_BOUNDS_UNAVAILABLE
enum.comment: The space's bounds are not known at the moment.

enum.name: XR_SESSION_NOT_FOCUSED
enum.comment: The session is not in the focused state.

enum.name: XR_FRAME_DISCARDED
enum.comment: A frame has been discarded from composition.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_VALIDATION_FAILURE
enum.comment: The function usage was invalid in some way.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_RUNTIME_FAILURE
enum.comment: The runtime failed to handle the function in an unexpected way that is not covered by another error result.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_OUT_OF_MEMORY
enum.comment: A memory allocation has failed.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_API_VERSION_UNSUPPORTED
enum.comment: The runtime does not support the requested API version.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_INITIALIZATION_FAILED
enum.comment: Initialization of object could not be completed.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_FUNCTION_UNSUPPORTED
enum.comment: The requested function was not found or is otherwise unsupported.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_FEATURE_UNSUPPORTED
enum.comment: The requested feature is not supported.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_EXTENSION_NOT_PRESENT
enum.comment: A requested extension is not supported.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_LIMIT_REACHED
enum.comment: The runtime supports no more of the requested resource.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SIZE_INSUFFICIENT
enum.comment: The supplied size was smaller than required.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_HANDLE_INVALID
enum.comment: A supplied object handle was invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_INSTANCE_LOST
enum.comment: The slink:XrInstance was lost or could not be found. It will need to be destroyed and optionally recreated.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SESSION_RUNNING
enum.comment: The session <<session-running, is already running>>.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SESSION_NOT_RUNNING
enum.comment: The session <<session-not-running, is not yet running>>.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SESSION_LOST
enum.comment: The slink:XrSession was lost. It will need to be destroyed and optionally recreated.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SYSTEM_INVALID
enum.comment: The provided basetype:XrSystemId was invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_PATH_INVALID
enum.comment: The provided basetype:XrPath was not valid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_PATH_COUNT_EXCEEDED
enum.comment: The maximum number of supported semantic paths has been reached.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_PATH_FORMAT_INVALID
enum.comment: The semantic path character format is invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_PATH_UNSUPPORTED
enum.comment: The semantic path is unsupported.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_LAYER_INVALID
enum.comment: The layer was NULL or otherwise invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_LAYER_LIMIT_EXCEEDED
enum.comment: The number of specified layers is greater than the supported number.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SWAPCHAIN_RECT_INVALID
enum.comment: The image rect was negatively sized or otherwise invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SWAPCHAIN_FORMAT_UNSUPPORTED
enum.comment: The image format is not supported by the runtime or platform.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_ACTION_TYPE_MISMATCH
enum.comment: The API used to retrieve an action's state does not match the action's type.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SESSION_NOT_READY
enum.comment: The session is not in the ready state.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SESSION_NOT_STOPPING
enum.comment: The session is not in the stopping state.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_TIME_INVALID
enum.comment: The provided basetype:XrTime was zero, negative, or out of range.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_REFERENCE_SPACE_UNSUPPORTED
enum.comment: The specified reference space is not supported by the runtime or system.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_FILE_ACCESS_ERROR
enum.comment: The file could not be accessed.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_FILE_CONTENTS_INVALID
enum.comment: The file's contents were invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_FORM_FACTOR_UNSUPPORTED
enum.comment: The specified form factor is not supported by the current runtime or platform.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_FORM_FACTOR_UNAVAILABLE
enum.comment: The specified form factor is supported, but the device is currently not available, e.g. not plugged in or powered off.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_API_LAYER_NOT_PRESENT
enum.comment: A requested API layer is not present or could not be loaded.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_CALL_ORDER_INVALID
enum.comment: The call was made without having made a previously required call.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_GRAPHICS_DEVICE_INVALID
enum.comment: The given graphics device is not in a valid state. The graphics device could be lost or initialized without meeting graphics requirements.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_POSE_INVALID
enum.comment: The supplied pose was invalid with respect to the requirements.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_INDEX_OUT_OF_RANGE
enum.comment: The supplied index was outside the range of valid indices.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_VIEW_CONFIGURATION_TYPE_UNSUPPORTED
enum.comment: The specified view configuration type is not supported by the runtime or platform.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_ENVIRONMENT_BLEND_MODE_UNSUPPORTED
enum.comment: The specified environment blend mode is not supported by the runtime or platform.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_NAME_DUPLICATED
enum.comment: The name provided was a duplicate of an already-existing resource.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_NAME_INVALID
enum.comment: The name provided was invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_ACTIONSET_NOT_ATTACHED
enum.comment: A referenced action set is not attached to the session.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_ACTIONSETS_ALREADY_ATTACHED
enum.comment: The session already has attached action sets.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_LOCALIZED_NAME_DUPLICATED
enum.comment: The localized name provided was a duplicate of an already-existing resource.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_LOCALIZED_NAME_INVALID
enum.comment: The localized name provided was invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_GRAPHICS_REQUIREMENTS_CALL_MISSING
enum.comment: The fname:xrGetGraphicsRequirements* call was not made before calling fname:xrCreateSession.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_RUNTIME_UNAVAILABLE
enum.comment: The loader was unable to find or load a runtime.

enums.name: XrObjectType
enums.comment: Enums to track objects of various types

enum.name: XR_EYE_VISIBILITY_BOTH
enum.comment: Display in both eyes.

enum.name: XR_EYE_VISIBILITY_LEFT
enum.comment: Display in the left eye only.

enum.name: XR_EYE_VISIBILITY_RIGHT
enum.comment: Display in the right eye only.

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_LEVEL_POWER_SAVINGS_EXT
enum.comment: Performance settings hint used by the application to indicate that it enters a non-XR section (head-locked / static screen), during which power savings are to be prioritized

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_LEVEL_SUSTAINED_LOW_EXT
enum.comment: Performance settings hint used by the application to indicate that it enters a low and stable complexity section, during which reducing power is more important than occasional late rendering frames

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_LEVEL_SUSTAINED_HIGH_EXT
enum.comment: Performance settings hint used by the application to indicate that it enters a high or dynamic complexity section, during which the XR Runtime strives for consistent XR compositing and frame rendering within a thermally sustainable range

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_LEVEL_BOOST_EXT
enum.comment: Performance settings hint used by the application to indicate that the application enters a section with very high complexity, during which the XR Runtime is allowed to step up beyond the thermally sustainable range

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_DOMAIN_CPU_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates that the performance settings or notification applies to CPU domain

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_DOMAIN_GPU_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates that the performance settings or notification applies to GPU domain

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_SUB_DOMAIN_COMPOSITING_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates that the performance notification originates from the COMPOSITING sub-domain

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_SUB_DOMAIN_RENDERING_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates that the performance notification originates from the RENDERING sub-domain

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_SUB_DOMAIN_THERMAL_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates that the performance notification originates from the THERMAL sub-domain

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_NOTIF_LEVEL_NORMAL_EXT
enum.comment: Notifies that the sub-domain has reached a level where no further actions other than currently applied are necessary

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_NOTIF_LEVEL_WARNING_EXT
enum.comment: Notifies that the sub-domain has reached an early warning level where the application should start proactive mitigation actions with the goal to return to the ename:XR_PERF_NOTIF_LEVEL_NORMAL level

enum.name: XR_PERF_SETTINGS_NOTIF_LEVEL_IMPAIRED_EXT
enum.comment: Notifies that the sub-domain has reached a critical level with significant performance degradation. The application should take drastic mitigation action

enum.name: XR_VISIBILITY_MASK_TYPE_HIDDEN_TRIANGLE_MESH_KHR
enum.comment: exclusive mesh; indicates that which the viewer cannot see.

enum.name: XR_VISIBILITY_MASK_TYPE_VISIBLE_TRIANGLE_MESH_KHR
enum.comment: inclusive mesh; indicates strictly that which the viewer can see.

enum.name: XR_VISIBILITY_MASK_TYPE_LINE_LOOP_KHR
enum.comment: line loop; traces the outline of the area the viewer can see.

enum.name: XR_HAND_TRACKING_DATA_SOURCE_UNOBSTRUCTED_EXT
enum.comment: This data source value indicates individual fingers and joints are tracked from unobstructed data source such as optical hand tracking, data gloves, or motion capture devices.

enum.name: XR_HAND_TRACKING_DATA_SOURCE_CONTROLLER_EXT
enum.comment: This data source value indicates hand joints are inferred based on motion controller state.

enum.name: XR_FACE_EXPRESSION_SET_DEFAULT_FB
enum.comment: indicates that the created slink:XrFaceTrackerFB tracks the set of blend shapes described by elink:XrFaceExpressionFB enum, i.e. the flink:xrGetFaceExpressionWeightsFB function returns an array of blend shapes with the count of ename:XR_FACE_EXPRESSION_COUNT_FB and can: be indexed using elink:XrFaceExpressionFB.

enum.name: XR_FACE_EXPRESSION_SET2_DEFAULT_FB
enum.comment: indicates that the created slink:XrFaceTracker2FB tracks the set of blend shapes described by elink:XrFaceExpression2FB enum, i.e. the flink:xrGetFaceExpressionWeights2FB function returns an array of blend shapes with the count of ename:XR_FACE_EXPRESSION2_COUNT_FB and can: be indexed using elink:XrFaceExpression2FB.

enum.name: XR_FACE_TRACKING_DATA_SOURCE2_VISUAL_FB
enum.comment: face tracking uses visual data to estimate expressions. Face tracking may use audio to further improve the quality of face tracking.

enum.name: XR_FACE_TRACKING_DATA_SOURCE2_AUDIO_FB
enum.comment: face tracking uses audio data to estimate expressions.

enums.name: XrBodyJointSetFB
enums.comment: Describes the set of body joints to track when creating an slink:XrBodyTrackerFB.

enum.name: XR_BODY_JOINT_SET_DEFAULT_FB
enum.comment: Indicates that the created slink:XrBodyTrackerFB tracks the set of body joints described by elink:XrBodyJointFB enum, i.e. the flink:xrLocateBodyJointsFB function returns an array of joint locations with the count of ename:XR_BODY_JOINT_COUNT_FB and can be indexed using elink:XrBodyJointFB.

enum.name: XR_EYE_POSITION_LEFT_FB
enum.comment: Specifies the position of the left eye.

enum.name: XR_EYE_POSITION_RIGHT_FB
enum.comment: Specifies the position of the right eye.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_PROFILE_DEFAULT_ML
enum.comment: Tracker profile that covers standard use cases. If this does not suite the needs of the application try the other profiles listed below.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_PROFILE_SPEED_ML
enum.comment: Optimized for speed. Use this profile to reduce the compute load and increase detection/tracker speed. This can result in low accuracy poses.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_PROFILE_ACCURACY_ML
enum.comment: Optimized for accuracy. Use this profile to optimize for accurate marker poses. This can cause increased load on the compute.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_PROFILE_SMALL_TARGETS_ML
enum.comment: Optimized for small targets. Use this profile to optimize for markers that are small or for larger markers that need to be detected from afar.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_PROFILE_LARGE_FOV_ML
enum.comment: Optimized for FoV. Use this profile to be able to detect markers across a larger FoV. The marker tracker system will attempt to use multiple cameras to detect the markers.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_PROFILE_CUSTOM_ML
enum.comment: Custom Tracker Profile. The application can define a custom tracker profile. See slink:XrMarkerDetectorCustomProfileInfoML for more details.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_TYPE_ARUCO_ML
enum.comment: Aruco Marker detection and localization. The marker id of the Aruco marker is available via flink:xrGetMarkerNumberML.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_TYPE_APRIL_TAG_ML
enum.comment: AprilTag detection and localization. The marker id of the AprilTags is available via flink:xrGetMarkerNumberML.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_TYPE_QR_ML
enum.comment: QR code detection and localization. The contents of the QR code is available via flink:xrGetMarkerStringML.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_TYPE_EAN_13_ML
enum.comment: EAN-13, detection only, not locatable. The contents of the barcode is available via flink:xrGetMarkerStringML.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_TYPE_UPC_A_ML
enum.comment: UPC-A, detection only, not locatable. The contents of the barcode is available via flink:xrGetMarkerStringML.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_TYPE_CODE_128_ML
enum.comment: Code 128, detection only, not locatable. The contents of the barcode is available via flink:xrGetMarkerStringML.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_ARUCO_DICT_4X4_50_ML
enum.comment: 4 by 4 pixel Aruco marker dictionary with 50 IDs.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_ARUCO_DICT_4X4_100_ML
enum.comment: 4 by 4 pixel Aruco marker dictionary with 100 IDs.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_ARUCO_DICT_4X4_250_ML
enum.comment: 4 by 4 pixel Aruco marker dictionary with 250 IDs.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_ARUCO_DICT_4X4_1000_ML
enum.comment: 4 by 4 pixel Aruco marker dictionary with 1000 IDs.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_ARUCO_DICT_5X5_50_ML
enum.comment: 5 by 5 pixel Aruco marker dictionary with 50 IDs.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_ARUCO_DICT_5X5_100_ML
enum.comment: 5 by 5 pixel Aruco marker dictionary with 100 IDs.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_ARUCO_DICT_5X5_250_ML
enum.comment: 5 by 5 pixel Aruco marker dictionary with 250 IDs.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_ARUCO_DICT_5X5_1000_ML
enum.comment: 5 by 5 pixel Aruco marker dictionary with 1000 IDs.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_ARUCO_DICT_6X6_50_ML
enum.comment: 6 by 6 pixel Aruco marker dictionary with 50 IDs.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_ARUCO_DICT_6X6_100_ML
enum.comment: 6 by 6 pixel Aruco marker dictionary with 100 IDs.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_ARUCO_DICT_6X6_250_ML
enum.comment: 6 by 6 pixel Aruco marker dictionary with 250 IDs.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_ARUCO_DICT_6X6_1000_ML
enum.comment: 6 by 6 pixel Aruco marker dictionary with 1000 IDs.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_ARUCO_DICT_7X7_50_ML
enum.comment: 7 by 7 pixel Aruco marker dictionary with 50 IDs.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_ARUCO_DICT_7X7_100_ML
enum.comment: 7 by 7 pixel Aruco marker dictionary with 100 IDs.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_ARUCO_DICT_7X7_250_ML
enum.comment: 7 by 7 pixel Aruco marker dictionary with 250 IDs.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_ARUCO_DICT_7X7_1000_ML
enum.comment: 7 by 7 pixel Aruco marker dictionary with 1000 IDs.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_APRIL_TAG_DICT_16H5_ML
enum.comment: 4 by 4 bits, minimum Hamming distance between any two codes = 5, 30 codes.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_APRIL_TAG_DICT_25H9_ML
enum.comment: 5 by 5 bits, minimum Hamming distance between any two codes = 9, 35 codes.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_APRIL_TAG_DICT_36H10_ML
enum.comment: 6 by 6 bits, minimum Hamming distance between any two codes = 10, 2320 codes.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_APRIL_TAG_DICT_36H11_ML
enum.comment: 6 by 6 bits, minimum Hamming distance between any two codes = 11, 587 codes.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_FPS_LOW_ML
enum.comment: Low FPS.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_FPS_MEDIUM_ML
enum.comment: Medium FPS.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_FPS_HIGH_ML
enum.comment: High FPS.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_FPS_MAX_ML
enum.comment: Max possible FPS.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_RESOLUTION_LOW_ML
enum.comment: Low Resolution.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_RESOLUTION_MEDIUM_ML
enum.comment: Medium Resolution.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_RESOLUTION_HIGH_ML
enum.comment: High Resolution.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_CAMERA_RGB_CAMERA_ML
enum.comment: Single RGB camera.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_CAMERA_WORLD_CAMERAS_ML
enum.comment: One or more world cameras.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_CORNER_REFINE_METHOD_NONE_ML
enum.comment: No refinement. Inaccurate corners.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_CORNER_REFINE_METHOD_SUBPIX_ML
enum.comment: Subpixel refinement. Corners have subpixel coordinates. High detection rate, very fast, reasonable accuracy.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_CORNER_REFINE_METHOD_CONTOUR_ML
enum.comment: Contour refinement. High detection rate, fast, reasonable accuracy.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_CORNER_REFINE_METHOD_APRIL_TAG_ML
enum.comment: AprilTag refinement. Reasonable detection rate, slowest, but very accurate. Only valid with AprilTags.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_FULL_ANALYSIS_INTERVAL_MAX_ML
enum.comment: Detector analyzes every frame fully.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_FULL_ANALYSIS_INTERVAL_FAST_ML
enum.comment: Detector analyzes frame fully very often.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_FULL_ANALYSIS_INTERVAL_MEDIUM_ML
enum.comment: Detector analyzes frame fully a few times per second.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_FULL_ANALYSIS_INTERVAL_SLOW_ML
enum.comment: Detector analyzes frame fully about every second.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_STATUS_PENDING_ML
enum.comment: The marker detector is working on a new snapshot.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_STATUS_READY_ML
enum.comment: The marker detector is ready to be inspected.

enum.name: XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_STATUS_ERROR_ML
enum.comment: The marker detector has encountered a fatal error.

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_CREATE_PROTECTED_CONTENT_BIT
enum.comment: Content will be protected from CPU access

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_CREATE_STATIC_IMAGE_BIT
enum.comment: Only one image will be acquired from this swapchain over its lifetime

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_USAGE_COLOR_ATTACHMENT_BIT
enum.comment: Specifies that the image may: be a color rendering target.

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_USAGE_DEPTH_STENCIL_ATTACHMENT_BIT
enum.comment: Specifies that the image may: be a depth/stencil rendering target.

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_USAGE_UNORDERED_ACCESS_BIT
enum.comment: Specifies that the image may: be accessed out of order and that access may: be via atomic operations.

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_USAGE_TRANSFER_SRC_BIT
enum.comment: Specifies that the image may: be used as the source of a transfer operation.

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_USAGE_TRANSFER_DST_BIT
enum.comment: Specifies that the image may: be used as the destination of a transfer operation.

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_USAGE_SAMPLED_BIT
enum.comment: Specifies that the image may: be sampled by a shader.

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_USAGE_MUTABLE_FORMAT_BIT
enum.comment: Specifies that the image may: be reinterpreted as another image format.

enum.name: XR_VIEW_STATE_ORIENTATION_VALID_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates validity of all slink:XrView orientations

enum.name: XR_VIEW_STATE_POSITION_VALID_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates validity of all slink:XrView positions

enum.name: XR_VIEW_STATE_ORIENTATION_TRACKED_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates whether all slink:XrView orientations are actively tracked

enum.name: XR_VIEW_STATE_POSITION_TRACKED_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates whether all slink:XrView positions are actively tracked

enum.name: XR_COMPOSITION_LAYER_CORRECT_CHROMATIC_ABERRATION_BIT
enum.comment: Enables chromatic aberration correction when not done by default. This flag has no effect on any known conformant runtime, and is officially deprecated in OpenXR 1.1.

enum.name: XR_COMPOSITION_LAYER_BLEND_TEXTURE_SOURCE_ALPHA_BIT
enum.comment: Enables the layer texture alpha channel.

enum.name: XR_COMPOSITION_LAYER_UNPREMULTIPLIED_ALPHA_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates the texture color channels have not been premultiplied by the texture alpha channel.

enum.name: XR_SPACE_LOCATION_ORIENTATION_VALID_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates that the pname:orientation member contains valid data

enum.name: XR_SPACE_LOCATION_POSITION_VALID_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates that the pname:position member contains valid data

enum.name: XR_SPACE_LOCATION_ORIENTATION_TRACKED_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates whether pname:pose member contains an actively tracked pname:orientation

enum.name: XR_SPACE_LOCATION_POSITION_TRACKED_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates whether pname:pose member contains an actively tracked pname:position

enum.name: XR_SPACE_VELOCITY_LINEAR_VALID_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates that the pname:linearVelocity member contains valid data. Applications must: not read the pname:linearVelocity field if this flag is unset.

enum.name: XR_SPACE_VELOCITY_ANGULAR_VALID_BIT
enum.comment: Indicates that the pname:angularVelocity member contains valid data. Applications must: not read the pname:angularVelocity field if this flag is unset.

enum.name: XR_INPUT_SOURCE_LOCALIZED_NAME_USER_PATH_BIT
enum.comment: Asks for the part of the string which indicates the top level user path the source represents

enum.name: XR_INPUT_SOURCE_LOCALIZED_NAME_INTERACTION_PROFILE_BIT
enum.comment: Asks for the part of the string which represents the interaction profile of the source

enum.name: XR_INPUT_SOURCE_LOCALIZED_NAME_COMPONENT_BIT
enum.comment: Asks for the part of the string which represents the component on the device which needs to be interacted with

enum.name: XR_DEBUG_UTILS_MESSAGE_SEVERITY_VERBOSE_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: Most verbose output severity, typically used for debugging.

enum.name: XR_DEBUG_UTILS_MESSAGE_SEVERITY_INFO_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: General info message

enum.name: XR_DEBUG_UTILS_MESSAGE_SEVERITY_WARNING_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates the item may be the cause of issues.

enum.name: XR_DEBUG_UTILS_MESSAGE_SEVERITY_ERROR_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates that the item is definitely related to erroneous behavior.

enum.name: XR_DEBUG_UTILS_MESSAGE_TYPE_GENERAL_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates this is a general message

enum.name: XR_DEBUG_UTILS_MESSAGE_TYPE_VALIDATION_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates the message is related to a validation message

enum.name: XR_DEBUG_UTILS_MESSAGE_TYPE_PERFORMANCE_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates the message is related to a potential performance situation

enum.name: XR_DEBUG_UTILS_MESSAGE_TYPE_CONFORMANCE_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: Indicates the message is related to a non-conformant runtime result

enum.name: XR_OVERLAY_MAIN_SESSION_ENABLED_COMPOSITION_LAYER_INFO_DEPTH_BIT_EXTX
enum.comment: Indicates the main session enabled `XR_KHR_composition_layer_depth`

enum.name: XR_ANDROID_SURFACE_SWAPCHAIN_SYNCHRONOUS_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Create the underlying BufferQueue in synchronous mode

enum.name: XR_ANDROID_SURFACE_SWAPCHAIN_USE_TIMESTAMPS_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Acquire most recent buffer whose presentation timestamp is not greater than display time of final composited frame

enum.name: XR_COMPOSITION_LAYER_IMAGE_LAYOUT_VERTICAL_FLIP_BIT_FB
enum.comment: The coordinate origin of the swapchain image must be considered to be flipped vertically.

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_CREATE_FOVEATION_SCALED_BIN_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Explicitly create the swapchain with scaled bin foveation support. The application must ensure that the swapchain is using the OpenGL graphics API and that the QCOM_texture_foveated extension is supported and enabled.

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_CREATE_FOVEATION_FRAGMENT_DENSITY_MAP_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Explicitly create the swapchain with fragment density map foveation support. The application must ensure that the swapchain is using the Vulkan graphics API and that the VK_EXT_fragment_density_map extension is supported and enabled.

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_EYE_TRACKED_STATE_VALID_BIT_META
enum.comment: Indicates whether or not foveation data is valid. This can happen if the eye tracker is obscured, the camera has dirt, or eye lid is closed, etc.

enum.name: XR_COMPOSITION_LAYER_SECURE_CONTENT_EXCLUDE_LAYER_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Indicates the layer will only be visible inside the HMD, and not visible to external sources

enum.name: XR_COMPOSITION_LAYER_SECURE_CONTENT_REPLACE_LAYER_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Indicates the layer will be displayed inside the HMD, but replaced by proxy content when written to external sources

enum.name: XR_SPACE_COMPONENT_TYPE_LOCATABLE_FB
enum.comment: Enables tracking the 6 DOF pose of the slink:XrSpace with flink:xrLocateSpace.

enum.name: XR_SPACE_COMPONENT_TYPE_STORABLE_FB
enum.comment: Enables persistence operations: save and erase.

enum.name: XR_SPACE_COMPONENT_TYPE_SHARABLE_FB
enum.comment: Enables sharing of spatial entities.

enum.name: XR_SPACE_COMPONENT_TYPE_BOUNDED_2D_FB
enum.comment: Bounded 2D component.

enum.name: XR_SPACE_COMPONENT_TYPE_BOUNDED_3D_FB
enum.comment: Bounded 3D component.

enum.name: XR_SPACE_COMPONENT_TYPE_SEMANTIC_LABELS_FB
enum.comment: Semantic labels component.

enum.name: XR_SPACE_COMPONENT_TYPE_ROOM_LAYOUT_FB
enum.comment: Room layout component.

enum.name: XR_SPACE_COMPONENT_TYPE_SPACE_CONTAINER_FB
enum.comment: Space container component.

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_LEVEL_NONE_FB
enum.comment: No foveation

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_LEVEL_LOW_FB
enum.comment: Less foveation (higher periphery visual fidelity, lower performance)

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_LEVEL_MEDIUM_FB
enum.comment: Medium foveation (medium periphery visual fidelity, medium performance)

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_LEVEL_HIGH_FB
enum.comment: High foveation (lower periphery visual fidelity, higher performance)

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_DYNAMIC_DISABLED_FB
enum.comment: Static foveation at the maximum desired level

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_DYNAMIC_LEVEL_ENABLED_FB
enum.comment: Dynamic changing foveation based on performance headroom available up to the maximum desired level

enum.name: XR_WINDING_ORDER_UNKNOWN_FB
enum.comment: Winding order is unknown and the runtime cannot make any assumptions on the triangle orientation

enum.name: XR_WINDING_ORDER_CW_FB
enum.comment: Clockwise winding order

enum.name: XR_WINDING_ORDER_CCW_FB
enum.comment: Counter-clockwise winding order

enum.name: XR_TRIANGLE_MESH_MUTABLE_BIT_FB
enum.comment: The triangle mesh is mutable (can be modified after it is created).

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_LAYER_PURPOSE_RECONSTRUCTION_FB
enum.comment: Reconstruction passthrough (full screen environment)

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_LAYER_PURPOSE_PROJECTED_FB
enum.comment: Projected passthrough (using a custom surface)

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_IS_RUNNING_AT_CREATION_BIT_FB
enum.comment: The object (passthrough, layer) is running at creation.

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_LAYER_DEPTH_BIT_FB
enum.comment: The passthrough system sends depth information to the compositor. Only applicable to layer objects.

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_STATE_CHANGED_REINIT_REQUIRED_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Passthrough system requires reinitialization.

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_STATE_CHANGED_NON_RECOVERABLE_ERROR_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Non-recoverable error has occurred. A device reboot or a firmware update may be required.

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_STATE_CHANGED_RECOVERABLE_ERROR_BIT_FB
enum.comment: A recoverable error has occurred. The runtime will attempt to recover, but some functionality may be temporarily unavailable.

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_STATE_CHANGED_RESTORED_ERROR_BIT_FB
enum.comment: The runtime has recovered from a previous error and is functioning normally.

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_CAPABILITY_BIT_FB
enum.comment: The system supports passthrough.

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_CAPABILITY_COLOR_BIT_FB
enum.comment: The system can show passthrough with realistic colors. ename:XR_PASSTHROUGH_CAPABILITY_BIT_FB must: be set if ename:XR_PASSTHROUGH_CAPABILITY_COLOR_BIT_FB is set.

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_CAPABILITY_LAYER_DEPTH_BIT_FB
enum.comment: The system supports passthrough layers composited using depth testing. ename:XR_PASSTHROUGH_CAPABILITY_BIT_FB must: be set if ename:XR_PASSTHROUGH_CAPABILITY_LAYER_DEPTH_BIT_FB is set.

enum.name: XR_SPACE_QUERY_ACTION_LOAD_FB
enum.comment: Tells the query to perform a load operation on any slink:XrSpace returned by the query.

enum.name: XR_SPACE_STORAGE_LOCATION_INVALID_FB
enum.comment: Invalid storage location

enum.name: XR_SPACE_STORAGE_LOCATION_LOCAL_FB
enum.comment: Local device storage

enum.name: XR_SPACE_STORAGE_LOCATION_CLOUD_FB
enum.comment: Cloud storage

enum.name: XR_SPACE_PERSISTENCE_MODE_INVALID_FB
enum.comment: Invalid storage persistence

enum.name: XR_SPACE_PERSISTENCE_MODE_INDEFINITE_FB
enum.comment: Store slink:XrSpace indefinitely, or until erased

enum.name: XR_SEMANTIC_LABELS_SUPPORT_MULTIPLE_SEMANTIC_LABELS_BIT_FB
enum.comment: If set, and the runtime reports the pname:extensionVersion as 2 or greater, the runtime may: return multiple semantic labels separated by a comma without spaces. Otherwise, the runtime must: return a single semantic label.

enum.name: XR_SEMANTIC_LABELS_SUPPORT_ACCEPT_DESK_TO_TABLE_MIGRATION_BIT_FB
enum.comment: If set, and the runtime reports the pname:extensionVersion as 3 or greater, the runtime must: return "TABLE" instead of "DESK" as a semantic label to the application. Otherwise, the runtime must: return "DESK" instead of "TABLE" as a semantic label to the application, when applicable.

enum.name: XR_SEMANTIC_LABELS_SUPPORT_ACCEPT_INVISIBLE_WALL_FACE_BIT_FB
enum.comment: If set, and the runtime reports the pname:extensionVersion as 4 or greater, the runtime may: return "INVISIBLE_WALL_FACE" instead of "WALL_FACE" as a semantic label to the application in order to represent an invisible wall used to conceptually separate a space (e.g., separate a living space from a kitchen space in an open floor plan house even though there is no real wall between the two spaces) instead of a real wall. Otherwise, the runtime must: return "WALL_FACE" as a semantic label to the application in order to represent both an invisible and real wall, when applicable.

enum.name: XR_LOCAL_DIMMING_MODE_OFF_META
enum.comment: Local dimming is turned off by default for the current submitted frame. This is the same as not chaining elink:XrLocalDimmingModeMETA.

enum.name: XR_LOCAL_DIMMING_MODE_ON_META
enum.comment: Local dimming is turned on for the current submitted frame.

enum.name: XR_HAND_TRACKING_AIM_COMPUTED_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Aiming data is computed from additional sources beyond the hand data in the base structure

enum.name: XR_HAND_TRACKING_AIM_VALID_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Aiming data is valid

enum.name: XR_HAND_TRACKING_AIM_INDEX_PINCHING_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Index finger pinch discrete signal

enum.name: XR_HAND_TRACKING_AIM_MIDDLE_PINCHING_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Middle finger pinch discrete signal

enum.name: XR_HAND_TRACKING_AIM_RING_PINCHING_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Ring finger pinch discrete signal

enum.name: XR_HAND_TRACKING_AIM_LITTLE_PINCHING_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Little finger pinch discrete signal

enum.name: XR_HAND_TRACKING_AIM_SYSTEM_GESTURE_BIT_FB
enum.comment: System gesture is active

enum.name: XR_HAND_TRACKING_AIM_DOMINANT_HAND_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Hand is currently marked as dominant for the system

enum.name: XR_HAND_TRACKING_AIM_MENU_PRESSED_BIT_FB
enum.comment: System menu gesture is active

enum.name: XR_KEYBOARD_TRACKING_EXISTS_BIT_FB
enum.comment: indicates that the system has a physically tracked keyboard to report. If not set then no other bits should be considered to be valid or meaningful. If set either XR_KEYBOARD_TRACKING_LOCAL_BIT_FB or XR_KEYBOARD_TRACKING_REMOTE_BIT_FB must also be set.

enum.name: XR_KEYBOARD_TRACKING_LOCAL_BIT_FB
enum.comment: indicates that the physically tracked keyboard is intended to be used in a local pairing with the system. Mutally exclusive with XR_KEYBOARD_TRACKING_REMOTE_BIT_FB.

enum.name: XR_KEYBOARD_TRACKING_REMOTE_BIT_FB
enum.comment: indicates that the physically tracked keyboard is intended to be used while paired to a separate remote computing device. Mutally exclusive with XR_KEYBOARD_TRACKING_LOCAL_BIT_FB.

enum.name: XR_KEYBOARD_TRACKING_CONNECTED_BIT_FB
enum.comment: indicates that the physically tracked keyboard is actively connected to the headset and capable of sending key data

enum.name: XR_KEYBOARD_TRACKING_QUERY_LOCAL_BIT_FB
enum.comment: indicates the query is for the physically tracked keyboard that is intended to be used in a local pairing with the System. Mutally exclusive with XR_KEYBOARD_TRACKING_QUERY_REMOTE_BIT_FB.

enum.name: XR_KEYBOARD_TRACKING_QUERY_REMOTE_BIT_FB
enum.comment: indicates the query is for the physically tracked keyboard that may be connected to a separate remote computing device. Mutally exclusive with XR_KEYBOARD_TRACKING_QUERY_LOCAL_BIT_FB.

enum.name: XR_COMPOSITION_LAYER_SPACE_WARP_INFO_FRAME_SKIP_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Skip current frame's space warp extrapolation

enum.name: XR_RENDER_MODEL_SUPPORTS_GLTF_2_0_SUBSET_1_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Minimal level of support. Can only contain a single mesh. Can only contain a single texture. Can not contain transparency. Assumes unlit rendering. Requires Extension KHR_texturebasisu.

enum.name: XR_RENDER_MODEL_SUPPORTS_GLTF_2_0_SUBSET_2_BIT_FB
enum.comment: All of XR_RENDER_MODEL_SUPPORTS_GLTF_2_0_SUBSET_1_BIT_FB support plus: Multiple meshes. Multiple Textures. Texture Transparency.

enum.name: XR_FACIAL_TRACKING_TYPE_EYE_DEFAULT_HTC
enum.comment: Specifies this handle will observe eye expressions, with values indexed by elink:XrEyeExpressionHTC whose count is dlink:XR_FACIAL_EXPRESSION_EYE_COUNT_HTC.

enum.name: XR_FACIAL_TRACKING_TYPE_LIP_DEFAULT_HTC
enum.comment: Specifies this handle will observe lip expressions, with values indexed by elink:XrLipExpressionHTC whose count is dlink:XR_FACIAL_EXPRESSION_LIP_COUNT_HTC.

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_FORM_PLANAR_HTC
enum.comment: Presents the passthrough with full of the entire screen.

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_FORM_PROJECTED_HTC
enum.comment: Presents the passthrough projecting onto a custom mesh.

enum.name: XR_DIGITAL_LENS_CONTROL_PROCESSING_DISABLE_BIT_ALMALENCE
enum.comment: disables Digital Lens processing of render textures

enum.name: XR_COMPOSITION_LAYER_SETTINGS_NORMAL_SUPER_SAMPLING_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Indicates compositor may: use layer texture supersampling.

enum.name: XR_COMPOSITION_LAYER_SETTINGS_QUALITY_SUPER_SAMPLING_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Indicates compositor may: use high quality layer texture supersampling.

enum.name: XR_COMPOSITION_LAYER_SETTINGS_NORMAL_SHARPENING_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Indicates compositor may: use layer texture sharpening.

enum.name: XR_COMPOSITION_LAYER_SETTINGS_QUALITY_SHARPENING_BIT_FB
enum.comment: Indicates compositor may: use high quality layer texture sharpening.

enum.name: XR_EXTERNAL_CAMERA_STATUS_CONNECTED_BIT_OCULUS
enum.comment: External camera is connected

enum.name: XR_EXTERNAL_CAMERA_STATUS_CALIBRATING_BIT_OCULUS
enum.comment: External camera is undergoing calibration

enum.name: XR_EXTERNAL_CAMERA_STATUS_CALIBRATION_FAILED_BIT_OCULUS
enum.comment: External camera has tried and failed calibration

enum.name: XR_EXTERNAL_CAMERA_STATUS_CALIBRATED_BIT_OCULUS
enum.comment: External camera has tried and passed calibration

enum.name: XR_EXTERNAL_CAMERA_STATUS_CAPTURING_BIT_OCULUS
enum.comment: External camera is capturing

enum.name: XR_EXTERNAL_CAMERA_ATTACHED_TO_DEVICE_NONE_OCULUS
enum.comment: External camera is at a fixed point in LOCAL space

enum.name: XR_EXTERNAL_CAMERA_ATTACHED_TO_DEVICE_HMD_OCULUS
enum.comment: External camera is attached to the HMD

enum.name: XR_EXTERNAL_CAMERA_ATTACHED_TO_DEVICE_LTOUCH_OCULUS
enum.comment: External camera is attached to a left Touch controller

enum.name: XR_EXTERNAL_CAMERA_ATTACHED_TO_DEVICE_RTOUCH_OCULUS
enum.comment: External camera is attached to a right Touch controller

enum.name: XR_PERFORMANCE_METRICS_COUNTER_ANY_VALUE_VALID_BIT_META
enum.comment: Indicates any of the values in XrPerformanceMetricsCounterMETA is valid.

enum.name: XR_PERFORMANCE_METRICS_COUNTER_UINT_VALUE_VALID_BIT_META
enum.comment: Indicates the uintValue in XrPerformanceMetricsCounterMETA is valid.

enum.name: XR_PERFORMANCE_METRICS_COUNTER_FLOAT_VALUE_VALID_BIT_META
enum.comment: Indicates the floatValue in XrPerformanceMetricsCounterMETA is valid.

enum.name: XR_PERFORMANCE_METRICS_COUNTER_UNIT_GENERIC_META
enum.comment: the performance counter unit is generic (unspecified).

enum.name: XR_PERFORMANCE_METRICS_COUNTER_UNIT_PERCENTAGE_META
enum.comment: the performance counter unit is percentage (%).

enum.name: XR_PERFORMANCE_METRICS_COUNTER_UNIT_MILLISECONDS_META
enum.comment: the performance counter unit is millisecond.

enum.name: XR_PERFORMANCE_METRICS_COUNTER_UNIT_BYTES_META
enum.comment: the performance counter unit is byte.

enum.name: XR_PERFORMANCE_METRICS_COUNTER_UNIT_HERTZ_META
enum.comment: the performance counter unit is hertz (Hz).

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_PREFERENCE_DEFAULT_TO_ACTIVE_BIT_META
enum.comment: Indicates that the runtime recommends apps to default to a mixed reality experience with passthrough (if supported).

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_MODE_DISABLE_HTC
enum.comment: No foveation

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_MODE_FIXED_HTC
enum.comment: Apply system default setting with fixed clear FOV and periphery quality.

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_MODE_DYNAMIC_HTC
enum.comment: Allow system to set foveation dynamically according realtime system metric or other extensions.

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_MODE_CUSTOM_HTC
enum.comment: Allow application to set foveation with desired clear FOV, periphery quality, and focal center offset.

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_DYNAMIC_LEVEL_ENABLED_BIT_HTC
enum.comment: Allow system to set periphery pixel density dynamically.

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_DYNAMIC_CLEAR_FOV_ENABLED_BIT_HTC
enum.comment: Allow system to set clear FOV degree dynamically.

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_DYNAMIC_FOCAL_CENTER_OFFSET_ENABLED_BIT_HTC
enum.comment: Allow system to set focal center offset dynamically.

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_LEVEL_NONE_HTC
enum.comment: No foveation

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_LEVEL_LOW_HTC
enum.comment: Light periphery pixel density drop and lower performance gain.

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_LEVEL_MEDIUM_HTC
enum.comment: Medium periphery pixel density drop and medium performance gain

enum.name: XR_FOVEATION_LEVEL_HIGH_HTC
enum.comment: Heavy periphery pixel density drop and higher performance gain

enum.name: XR_COMPARE_OP_NEVER_FB
enum.comment: Comparison is never true.

enum.name: XR_COMPARE_OP_LESS_FB
enum.comment: Comparison is true if source less than is destination.

enum.name: XR_COMPARE_OP_EQUAL_FB
enum.comment: Comparison is true if source is equal to destination.

enum.name: XR_COMPARE_OP_LESS_OR_EQUAL_FB
enum.comment: Comparison is true if source is less than or equal to destination.

enum.name: XR_COMPARE_OP_GREATER_FB
enum.comment: Comparison is true if source is greater than destination.

enum.name: XR_COMPARE_OP_NOT_EQUAL_FB
enum.comment: Comparison is true if source is not equal to destination.

enum.name: XR_COMPARE_OP_GREATER_OR_EQUAL_FB
enum.comment: Comparison is true if source is greater than or equal to destination.

enum.name: XR_COMPARE_OP_ALWAYS_FB
enum.comment: Comparison is always true.

enum.name: XR_FRAME_END_INFO_PROTECTED_BIT_ML
enum.comment: Indicates that the content for this frame is protected and should not be recorded or captured outside the graphics system.

enum.name: XR_FRAME_END_INFO_VIGNETTE_BIT_ML
enum.comment: Indicates that a soft fade to transparent should be added to the frame in the compositor to blend any hard edges at the FOV limits.

enum.name: XR_GLOBAL_DIMMER_FRAME_END_INFO_ENABLED_BIT_ML
enum.comment: Indicates that the global dimmer should: be enabled and controlled by slink:XrGlobalDimmerFrameEndInfoML::pname:dimmerValue.

enum.name: XR_TRACKING_OPTIMIZATION_SETTINGS_HINT_NONE_QCOM
enum.comment: Used by the application to indicate that it does not have a preference to optimize for. The run-time is understood to choose a balanced approach.

enum.name: XR_TRACKING_OPTIMIZATION_SETTINGS_HINT_LONG_RANGE_PRIORIZATION_QCOM
enum.comment: Used by the application to indicate that it prefers tracking to be optimized for long range, possibly at the expense of competing interests.

enum.name: XR_TRACKING_OPTIMIZATION_SETTINGS_HINT_CLOSE_RANGE_PRIORIZATION_QCOM
enum.comment: Used by the application to indicate that it prefers tracking to be optimized for close range, possibly at the expense of competing interests.

enum.name: XR_TRACKING_OPTIMIZATION_SETTINGS_HINT_LOW_POWER_PRIORIZATION_QCOM
enum.comment: Used by the application to indicate that it prefers tracking to be optimized for low power consumption, possibly at the expense of competing interests.

enum.name: XR_TRACKING_OPTIMIZATION_SETTINGS_HINT_HIGH_POWER_PRIORIZATION_QCOM
enum.comment: Used by the application to indicate that it prefers tracking to be optimized for increased tracking performance, possibly at the cost of increased power consumption.

enum.name: XR_TRACKING_OPTIMIZATION_SETTINGS_DOMAIN_ALL_QCOM
enum.comment: Setting applies to all QCOM tracking extensions.

enum.name: XR_FORCE_FEEDBACK_CURL_LOCATION_THUMB_CURL_MNDX
enum.comment: force feedback for thumb curl

enum.name: XR_FORCE_FEEDBACK_CURL_LOCATION_INDEX_CURL_MNDX
enum.comment: force feedback for index finger curl

enum.name: XR_FORCE_FEEDBACK_CURL_LOCATION_MIDDLE_CURL_MNDX
enum.comment: force feedback for middle finger curl

enum.name: XR_FORCE_FEEDBACK_CURL_LOCATION_RING_CURL_MNDX
enum.comment: force feedback for ring finger curl

enum.name: XR_FORCE_FEEDBACK_CURL_LOCATION_LITTLE_CURL_MNDX
enum.comment: force feedback for little finger curl

enum.name: XR_PLANE_DETECTOR_ENABLE_CONTOUR_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: populate the plane contour information

enum.name: XR_PLANE_DETECTION_CAPABILITY_PLANE_DETECTION_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: plane detection is supported

enum.name: XR_PLANE_DETECTION_CAPABILITY_PLANE_HOLES_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: polygon buffers for holes in planes can be generated

enum.name: XR_PLANE_DETECTION_CAPABILITY_SEMANTIC_CEILING_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: plane detection supports ceiling semantic classification

enum.name: XR_PLANE_DETECTION_CAPABILITY_SEMANTIC_FLOOR_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: plane detection supports floor semantic classification

enum.name: XR_PLANE_DETECTION_CAPABILITY_SEMANTIC_WALL_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: plane detection supports wall semantic classification

enum.name: XR_PLANE_DETECTION_CAPABILITY_SEMANTIC_PLATFORM_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: plane detection supports platform semantic classification (for example table tops)

enum.name: XR_PLANE_DETECTION_CAPABILITY_ORIENTATION_BIT_EXT
enum.comment: plane detection supports plane orientation classification. If not supported planes are always classified as ARBITRARY.

enum.name: XR_PLANE_DETECTOR_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL_UPWARD_EXT
enum.comment: The detected plane is horizontal and faces upward (e.g. floor).

enum.name: XR_PLANE_DETECTOR_ORIENTATION_HORIZONTAL_DOWNWARD_EXT
enum.comment: The detected plane is horizontal and faces downward (e.g. ceiling).

enum.name: XR_PLANE_DETECTOR_ORIENTATION_VERTICAL_EXT
enum.comment: The detected plane is vertical (e.g. wall).

enum.name: XR_PLANE_DETECTOR_ORIENTATION_ARBITRARY_EXT
enum.comment: The detected plane has an arbitrary, non-vertical and non-horizontal orientation.

enum.name: XR_PLANE_DETECTOR_SEMANTIC_TYPE_UNDEFINED_EXT
enum.comment: The runtime was unable to classify this plane.

enum.name: XR_PLANE_DETECTOR_SEMANTIC_TYPE_CEILING_EXT
enum.comment: The detected plane is a ceiling.

enum.name: XR_PLANE_DETECTOR_SEMANTIC_TYPE_FLOOR_EXT
enum.comment: The detected plane is a floor.

enum.name: XR_PLANE_DETECTOR_SEMANTIC_TYPE_WALL_EXT
enum.comment: The detected plane is a wall.

enum.name: XR_PLANE_DETECTOR_SEMANTIC_TYPE_PLATFORM_EXT
enum.comment: The detected plane is a platform, like a table.

enum.name: XR_VIRTUAL_KEYBOARD_LOCATION_TYPE_CUSTOM_META
enum.comment: Indicates that the application will provide the position and scale of the keyboard.

enum.name: XR_VIRTUAL_KEYBOARD_LOCATION_TYPE_FAR_META
enum.comment: Indicates that the runtime will set the position and scale for far field keyboard.

enum.name: XR_VIRTUAL_KEYBOARD_LOCATION_TYPE_DIRECT_META
enum.comment: Indicates that the runtime will set the position and scale for direct interaction keyboard.

enum.name: XR_VIRTUAL_KEYBOARD_INPUT_SOURCE_CONTROLLER_RAY_LEFT_META
enum.comment: Left controller ray.

enum.name: XR_VIRTUAL_KEYBOARD_INPUT_SOURCE_CONTROLLER_RAY_RIGHT_META
enum.comment: Right controller ray.

enum.name: XR_VIRTUAL_KEYBOARD_INPUT_SOURCE_HAND_RAY_LEFT_META
enum.comment: Left hand ray.

enum.name: XR_VIRTUAL_KEYBOARD_INPUT_SOURCE_HAND_RAY_RIGHT_META
enum.comment: Right hand ray.

enum.name: XR_VIRTUAL_KEYBOARD_INPUT_SOURCE_CONTROLLER_DIRECT_LEFT_META
enum.comment: Left controller direct touch.

enum.name: XR_VIRTUAL_KEYBOARD_INPUT_SOURCE_CONTROLLER_DIRECT_RIGHT_META
enum.comment: Right controller direct touch.

enum.name: XR_VIRTUAL_KEYBOARD_INPUT_SOURCE_HAND_DIRECT_INDEX_TIP_LEFT_META
enum.comment: Left hand direct touch.

enum.name: XR_VIRTUAL_KEYBOARD_INPUT_SOURCE_HAND_DIRECT_INDEX_TIP_RIGHT_META
enum.comment: Right hand direct touch.

enum.name: XR_VIRTUAL_KEYBOARD_INPUT_STATE_PRESSED_BIT_META
enum.comment: If the input source is considered 'pressed' at all. Pinch for hands, Primary button for controllers.

enum.name: XR_HEADSET_FIT_STATUS_UNKNOWN_ML
enum.comment: Headset fit status not available for unknown reason.

enum.name: XR_HEADSET_FIT_STATUS_NOT_WORN_ML
enum.comment: Headset not worn.

enum.name: XR_HEADSET_FIT_STATUS_GOOD_FIT_ML
enum.comment: Good fit.

enum.name: XR_HEADSET_FIT_STATUS_BAD_FIT_ML
enum.comment: Bad fit.

enum.name: XR_EYE_CALIBRATION_STATUS_UNKNOWN_ML
enum.comment: Eye calibration status not available for unknown reason.

enum.name: XR_EYE_CALIBRATION_STATUS_NONE_ML
enum.comment: User has not performed the eye calibration step. Use system provided app to perform eye calibration.

enum.name: XR_EYE_CALIBRATION_STATUS_COARSE_ML
enum.comment: Eye calibration is of lower accuracy.

enum.name: XR_EYE_CALIBRATION_STATUS_FINE_ML
enum.comment: Eye calibration is of higher accuracy.

enum.name: XR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_STATE_NOT_LOCALIZED_ML
enum.comment: The system is not localized into a map. Features like Spatial Anchors relying on localization will not work.

enum.name: XR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_STATE_LOCALIZED_ML
enum.comment: The system is localized into a map.

enum.name: XR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_STATE_LOCALIZATION_PENDING_ML
enum.comment: The system is localizing into a map.

enum.name: XR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_STATE_LOCALIZATION_SLEEPING_BEFORE_RETRY_ML
enum.comment: Initial localization failed, the system will retry localization.

enum.name: XR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_TYPE_ON_DEVICE_ML
enum.comment: The system is localized into an On-Device map, published anchors are not shared between different devices.

enum.name: XR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_TYPE_CLOUD_ML
enum.comment: The system is localized into a Cloud Map, anchors are shared per cloud account settings.

enum.name: XR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_CONFIDENCE_POOR_ML
enum.comment: The localization map has poor confidence, systems relying on the localization map are likely to have poor performance.

enum.name: XR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_CONFIDENCE_FAIR_ML
enum.comment: The confidence is fair, current environmental conditions may adversely affect localization.

enum.name: XR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_CONFIDENCE_GOOD_ML
enum.comment: The confidence is high, persistent content should be stable.

enum.name: XR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_CONFIDENCE_EXCELLENT_ML
enum.comment: This is a very high-confidence localization, persistent content will be very stable.

enum.name: XR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_ERROR_UNKNOWN_BIT_ML
enum.comment: Localization failed for an unknown reason.

enum.name: XR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_ERROR_OUT_OF_MAPPED_AREA_BIT_ML
enum.comment: Localization failed because the user is outside of the mapped area.

enum.name: XR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_ERROR_LOW_FEATURE_COUNT_BIT_ML
enum.comment: There are not enough features in the environment to successfully localize.

enum.name: XR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_ERROR_EXCESSIVE_MOTION_BIT_ML
enum.comment: Localization failed due to excessive motion.

enum.name: XR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_ERROR_LOW_LIGHT_BIT_ML
enum.comment: Localization failed because the lighting levels are too low in the environment.

enum.name: XR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_ERROR_HEADPOSE_BIT_ML
enum.comment: A headpose failure caused localization to be unsuccessful.

implicitexternsyncparams.param: the pname:session parameter by any other flink:xrBeginFrame or flink:xrEndFrame call
the pname:session parameter by any other flink:xrBeginFrame or flink:xrEndFrame call
the pname:session parameter by any other flink:xrWaitFrame call
the slink:XrInstance used to create pname:messenger, and all of its child handles
the buffers returned from calls to flink:xrTriangleMeshGetVertexBufferFB and flink:xrTriangleMeshGetIndexBufferFB on pname:mesh

interaction_profile.name: /interaction_profiles/samsung/odyssey_controller
interaction_profile.title: Samsung Odyssey Mixed Reality Motion Controller

require.comment: Types not directly used by the API

enum.name: XR_ERROR_EXTENSION_DEPENDENCY_NOT_ENABLED
enum.comment: One or more of the extensions being enabled has dependency on extensions that are not enabled.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_PERMISSION_INSUFFICIENT
enum.comment: Insufficient permissions. This error is included for use by vendor extensions. The precise definition of `XR_ERROR_PERMISSION_INSUFFICIENT` and actions possible by the developer or user to resolve it can vary by platform, extension or function. The developer should refer to the documentation of the function that returned the error code and extension it was defined.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_ANDROID_THREAD_SETTINGS_ID_INVALID_KHR
enum.comment: xrSetAndroidApplicationThreadKHR failed as thread id is invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_ANDROID_THREAD_SETTINGS_FAILURE_KHR
enum.comment: xrSetAndroidApplicationThreadKHR failed setting the thread attributes/priority.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_CREATE_SPATIAL_ANCHOR_FAILED_MSFT
enum.comment: Spatial anchor could not be created at that location.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SECONDARY_VIEW_CONFIGURATION_TYPE_NOT_ENABLED_MSFT
enum.comment: The secondary view configuration was not enabled when creating the session.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_CONTROLLER_MODEL_KEY_INVALID_MSFT
enum.comment: The controller model key is invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_REPROJECTION_MODE_UNSUPPORTED_MSFT
enum.comment: The reprojection mode is not supported.

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_USAGE_INPUT_ATTACHMENT_BIT_MND
enum.comment: Specifies that the image may: be used as a input attachment.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_COMPUTE_NEW_SCENE_NOT_COMPLETED_MSFT
enum.comment: Compute new scene not completed.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SCENE_COMPONENT_ID_INVALID_MSFT
enum.comment: Scene component id invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SCENE_COMPONENT_TYPE_MISMATCH_MSFT
enum.comment: Scene component type mismatch.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SCENE_MESH_BUFFER_ID_INVALID_MSFT
enum.comment: Scene mesh buffer id invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SCENE_COMPUTE_FEATURE_INCOMPATIBLE_MSFT
enum.comment: Scene compute feature incompatible.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SCENE_COMPUTE_CONSISTENCY_MISMATCH_MSFT
enum.comment: Scene compute consistency mismatch.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_DISPLAY_REFRESH_RATE_UNSUPPORTED_FB
enum.comment: The display refresh rate is not supported by the platform.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_COLOR_SPACE_UNSUPPORTED_FB
enum.comment: The color space is not supported by the runtime.

enum.name: XR_FB_HAND_TRACKING_CAPSULE_POINT_COUNT
enum.comment: Backward-compatibility alias containing typo.

enum.name: XR_FB_HAND_TRACKING_CAPSULE_COUNT
enum.comment: Backward-compatibility alias containing typo.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SPACE_COMPONENT_NOT_SUPPORTED_FB
enum.comment: The component type is not supported for this space.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SPACE_COMPONENT_NOT_ENABLED_FB
enum.comment: The required component is not enabled for this space.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SPACE_COMPONENT_STATUS_PENDING_FB
enum.comment: A request to set the component's status is currently pending.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SPACE_COMPONENT_STATUS_ALREADY_SET_FB
enum.comment: The component is already set to the requested value.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_UNEXPECTED_STATE_PASSTHROUGH_FB
enum.comment: The object state is unexpected for the issued command.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_FEATURE_ALREADY_CREATED_PASSTHROUGH_FB
enum.comment: Trying to create an MR feature when one was already created and only one instance is allowed.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_FEATURE_REQUIRED_PASSTHROUGH_FB
enum.comment: Requested functionality requires a feature to be created first.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_NOT_PERMITTED_PASSTHROUGH_FB
enum.comment: Requested functionality is not permitted - application is not allowed to perform the requested operation.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_INSUFFICIENT_RESOURCES_PASSTHROUGH_FB
enum.comment: There were insufficient resources available to perform an operation.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_UNKNOWN_PASSTHROUGH_FB
enum.comment: Unknown Passthrough error (no further details provided).

enum.name: XR_ERROR_RENDER_MODEL_KEY_INVALID_FB
enum.comment: The model key is invalid.

enum.name: XR_RENDER_MODEL_UNAVAILABLE_FB
enum.comment: The model is unavailable.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_MARKER_NOT_TRACKED_VARJO
enum.comment: Marker tracking is disabled or the specified marker is not currently tracked.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_MARKER_ID_INVALID_VARJO
enum.comment: The specified marker ID is not valid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_MARKER_DETECTOR_PERMISSION_DENIED_ML
enum.comment: The com.magicleap.permission.MARKER_TRACKING permission was denied.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_MARKER_DETECTOR_LOCATE_FAILED_ML
enum.comment: The specified marker could not be located spatially.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_MARKER_DETECTOR_INVALID_DATA_QUERY_ML
enum.comment: The marker queried does not contain data of the requested type.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_MARKER_DETECTOR_INVALID_CREATE_INFO_ML
enum.comment: pname:createInfo contains mutually exclusive parameters, such as setting ename:XR_MARKER_DETECTOR_CORNER_REFINE_METHOD_APRIL_TAG_ML with ename:XR_MARKER_TYPE_ARUCO_ML.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_MARKER_INVALID_ML
enum.comment: The marker id passed to the function was invalid.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_INCOMPATIBLE_ML
enum.comment: The localization map being imported is not compatible with current OS or mode.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_UNAVAILABLE_ML
enum.comment: The localization map requested is not available.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_FAIL_ML
enum.comment: The map localization service failed to fulfill the request, retry later.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_IMPORT_EXPORT_PERMISSION_DENIED_ML
enum.comment: The com.magicleap.permission.SPACE_IMPORT_EXPORT permission was denied.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_PERMISSION_DENIED_ML
enum.comment: The com.magicleap.permission.SPACE_MANAGER permission was denied.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_ALREADY_EXISTS_ML
enum.comment: The map being imported already exists in the system.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_LOCALIZATION_MAP_CANNOT_EXPORT_CLOUD_MAP_ML
enum.comment: The map localization service cannot export cloud based maps.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SPATIAL_ANCHOR_NAME_NOT_FOUND_MSFT
enum.comment: A spatial anchor was not found associated with the spatial anchor name provided

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SPATIAL_ANCHOR_NAME_INVALID_MSFT
enum.comment: The spatial anchor name provided was not valid

enum.name: XR_SCENE_MARKER_DATA_NOT_STRING_MSFT
enum.comment: Marker does not encode a string.

enum.name: XR_SWAPCHAIN_USAGE_INPUT_ATTACHMENT_BIT_KHR
enum.comment: Specifies that the image may: be used as a input attachment.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SPACE_MAPPING_INSUFFICIENT_FB
enum.comment: Anchor import from cloud or export from device failed.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SPACE_LOCALIZATION_FAILED_FB
enum.comment: Anchors were downloaded from the cloud but failed to be imported/aligned on the device.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SPACE_NETWORK_TIMEOUT_FB
enum.comment: Timeout occurred while waiting for network request to complete.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SPACE_NETWORK_REQUEST_FAILED_FB
enum.comment: The network request failed.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SPACE_CLOUD_STORAGE_DISABLED_FB
enum.comment: Cloud storage is required for this operation but is currently disabled.

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_LAYER_PURPOSE_TRACKED_KEYBOARD_HANDS_FB
enum.comment: Passthrough layer purpose for keyboard hands presence.

enum.name: XR_PASSTHROUGH_LAYER_PURPOSE_TRACKED_KEYBOARD_MASKED_HANDS_FB
enum.comment: Passthrough layer purpose for keyboard hands presence with keyboard masked hand transitions (i.e passthrough hands rendered only when they are over the keyboard).

enum.name: XR_ERROR_PASSTHROUGH_COLOR_LUT_BUFFER_SIZE_MISMATCH_META
enum.comment: The provided data buffer did not match the required size.

enum.name: XR_COMPOSITION_LAYER_SETTINGS_AUTO_LAYER_FILTER_BIT_META
enum.comment: Indicates compositor may: automatically toggle a texture filtering mechanism to improve visual quality of layer. This must: not be the only bit set. (Added by apiext:XR_META_automatic_layer_filter)

enum.name: XR_ENVIRONMENT_DEPTH_NOT_AVAILABLE_META
enum.comment: Warning: The requested depth image is not yet available.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_HINT_ALREADY_SET_QCOM
enum.comment: Tracking optimization hint is already set for the domain.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_NOT_AN_ANCHOR_HTC
enum.comment: The provided space is valid but not an anchor.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_SPACE_NOT_LOCATABLE_EXT
enum.comment: The space passed to the function was not locatable.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_PLANE_DETECTION_PERMISSION_DENIED_EXT
enum.comment: The permission for this resource was not granted.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_FUTURE_PENDING_EXT
enum.comment: Returned by completion function to indicate future is not ready.

enum.name: XR_ERROR_FUTURE_INVALID_EXT
enum.comment: Returned by completion function to indicate future is not valid.
